content: the white circles of fabric paint after they were dry i just completed the faces as i did the other side of the piece you can attach then ear to foot or ear to ear then foot to foot i decided on an ear to foot attachment with the middle 2 bunnies being attached ear to ear this makes them face the correct way on each end of the scarf i would love to see what other uses you come up with for this bunny so be sure to post photos and send me the link enjoy jane copperscaledragon@yahoo com
